ValidationRule.description: Options for Community RFI Item Status editing needs to prevent users from choosing options other than In Progress or Canceled
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( $Profile.Name = "PF Community User", $Profile.Name = "PF Community 3rd Party User"), OR( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(RFI_Item_Status__c),"Requested"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(RFI_Item_Status__c),"Needs Detail"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(RFI_Item_Status__c),"Submitted"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(RFI_Item_Status__c),"In Progress"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(RFI_Item_Status__c),"Closed"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(RFI_Item_Status__c),"Canceled"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(RFI_Item_Status__c),"Drafting"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(RFI_Item_Status__c),"Cannot Complete")), ISCHANGED(RFI_Item_Status__c ), OR( ISPICKVAL(RFI_Item_Status__c , "Closed"), ISPICKVAL(RFI_Item_Status__c , "Requested"), ISPICKVAL(RFI_Item_Status__c , "Needs Detail"), ISPICKVAL(RFI_Item_Status__c , "Drafting"), ISPICKVAL(RFI_Item_Status__c , "Cannot Complete")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Customer users cannot choose status other than "In progress, Submitted or Cancelled".
